name: Tetrepetete (2013)
description:
Tetrepetete

A portable game with blocks

Not to be confused with a game of a totally different name. The first game to introduce the innovative free-to-grey concept, offering a free grayscale version of the game. Also, it's kind of fun to play, yet small as a download.

More downloads are available at http://thp.io/2013/tetrepetete/
